name: The House (itch)
description:
Story:

Play as a man who wanted to clear his head and escape from everyday stress. So he rented a house in the nature but soon he relizes what mistake he made. There is something living in the house that is not friendly...
Escape in any way you can!

Inspired by Vanish.
There are couple of easter eggs in game. Hope you will find them. ;)

Controls:
WASD to move
LMB to move objects
E to interact
F for flashlight

Follow on Twitter : https://twitter.com/MatijaMurk
